page.title: 01Broughton
page.content: {Broughton is quite a small village situated on the A549 and A55 trunk road recently improved, 4 miles from Chester and just inside Wales. Population in 1971=4360 population in 1978=4750 for eg.15-65 age group increased to 59.9% Housing, there is not enough land for building houses in the next ten years There are not enough primary schools. If more people live there the faculties would improve. There is a lot of land which is no good for farming and could be used for housing.Number of houses in Brougton is 1700 in 1978.Private houses will increase by 1,000 in 10 years time. There is an average of 30 houses which will take 18 acres of land.There were in 1971 still people without inside toilets, hot water supply, and baths.
